pl.java.lab.Model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.java.lab.Model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    It's a class that is responsible for program logic. It converts hexadecimal numebrs to decimal numbers and decimal numbers to hexadecimal numbers. The data is stored and processed here.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Weronika Staneczek
